mapper.select: SELECT rn, orderDetailNo, partNumber, orderNo, orderdetailOrderQuantity, orderdetailAmount FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY partNumber DESC) AS rn, orderDetailNo, partNumber, orderNo, orderdetailOrderQuantity, orderdetailAmount FROM ORDERDETAIL) AS derived WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo} AND orderNo = #{orderNo}
